definition: car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159
to hold/to contain/to grasp/to take hold of/handle/particle marking the following noun as a direct object/classifier for objects with handle/classifier for small objects: handful

sentences.english: 'Jump up, ' said the man. 'Is that your boy?
sentences.chinese: “上来吧，”车把式说道，“这是你儿子？”

sentences.english: The plow banked the snow along the side of the road.
sentences.chinese: 扫雪车把雪沿路边堆积起来。

sentences.english: This is due to the fact that riders ride sitting up, because of the handlebar height.
sentences.chinese: 这是因为事实车手骑坐起来，因为车把的高度。

sentences.english: A bicycle handle is provided with a variable resistor for adjustment of bicycle speed.
sentences.chinese: 车把上设有可调节车速的可变电阻。

sentences.english: Comes standard with universal handlebar and sensor mounts for quick easy set-up.
sentences.chinese: 通用表座，适合任何车把，方便拆装。

sentences.english: Made for professional riders, it has a very light body and a broad handlebar.
sentences.chinese: 取得专业车手，并有著非常广阔的轻体车把。

sentences.english: Just as we neared S Gate, the handlebar suddenly caught someone, and they slowly fell down.
sentences.chinese: 刚近S门，忽而车把上带著一个人，慢慢地倒了。

sentences.english: Electra mount will secure the camera on the handlebar of your bike. [link]
sentences.chinese: Electra座架能将相机固定在你的车把上。

sentences.english: Th' deer come out of nowhere. Front paws straight up the handlebars.
sentences.chinese: 不知从哪就跑出一只鹿，前蹄就直冲到了你的车把上。

sentences.english: We were just approaching S-Gate when we knocked into someonewho slowly toppled over.
sentences.chinese: 刚近S门，忽而车把上带着一个人，慢慢地倒了。

sentences.english: It works by pressing a button on the handlebar.
sentences.chinese: 只要一按车把手上的按钮，火焰喷射器就会被发动。

sentences.english: Vintage middleweight bicycle handlebars are swept back and spread out towards the end.
sentences.chinese: 老式自行车车把不被洪水量级背部和蔓延对到底。

sentences.english: This chicken truck barged it's way up a jam-packed pedestrian street.
sentences.chinese: 这个运鸡车把拥挤的人行道给堵住了。

sentences.english: Bending over the handlebars, I pedaled furiously, ringing my bell as I passed.
sentences.chinese: 俯在车把上，我疯狂的蹬脚板，打着铃超过了他们。

sentences.english: They hold the handles and the back seat. Her mother carries a first-aid box on the shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 他们握住车把和车后座，妈妈肩上还背着急救箱。

definition: open-topped container (mounted on a truck or cart) for carrying loads/dump box (of a dump truck)/bucket (of a front loader)/wheelbarrow
car or other vehicle (bicycle, truck etc)
empress's throne/(fig.) first place in a feminine competition
to brake (when driving)/to stop/to switch off/to check (bad habits)/a brake
brake lever/crank handle for stopping or turning off machinery
pedal (in a car, on a piano etc)/treadle/footstool/footrest/footboard
